title: Portfolio
description: I decided to make a Portfolio myself using a web framework Svelte where I know absolutely nothing about the basics, nor in CSS or I do it myself without Bootstrap or others. I'm not a web developer at all and I really enjoy using Svelte since I started.

title: Lunastia
description: Minecraft server on the Desktop version, written in Java on the Spigot software, with the primary goal of training, learning Java, and secondarily opening a server on a version with a language that is not my comfort zone

title: RoyaumeBot
description: It is the bot of our Discord community, it offers various utility features. It is written in TypeScript and uses the DiscordJS package to interact with the Discord API.

title: Rox
description: A bot initially developed by me alone in JavaScript without having concrete knowledge, it reached 100 000 users but I stopped the development due to lack of knowledge and lack of time, resumed in 2022 in TypeScript with RomainSav to relaunch it, with a clean, uncluttered and understandable code.

title: Atlas
description: A server with 4100+ unique players (at the time of my departure). I developed the whole first version as well as the pre-release which was under another name (RivalityShock PvP) which lasted 4 months (from the moment I arrived), this is where I was able to use my knowledge of PocketMine-MP and get to where I am now
